title: David Guetta
summary: Pierre David Guetta (/ˈɡɛtə/; French pronunciation: ​[pjɛʁ david ɡɛta]; born 7 November 1967) is a French DJ, record producer and songwriter. He has racked up over 50 million record sales globally, with more than 10 billion streams.[2] In 2011, 2020 and 2021, Guetta was voted the number one DJ in the DJ Mag Top 100 DJs poll.[3] In 2013, Billboard crowned "When Love Takes Over" as the number one dance-pop collaboration of all time.[4]
